Title: Ethiopian Airlines commences  work on new airport
Summary: Ethiopian Airlines Group has commenced the construction of Bishoftu International Airport . The official groundbreaking was held at the airport in Ethiopia's capital, Nairobi .

Title: At AFCON watch parties, TECNO thrills fans with ELLA
Summary: At AFCON watch parties, TECNO thrills fans with ELLA . On match nights, football in Nigeria is rarely just about the scoreline . It is about community, energy, shared belief, and shared belief .

Title: Olu Obafemi’s mango world (3)
Summary: Olu Obafemi’s mango world (3) is in line with his mango vision . Clearly, there are several other very useful things that this gleaner and glimpser-glitterer might say about the world .

Title: Fubara, Mbah, Otu, Diri reaffirm support for military, families of fallen heroes
Summary: Rivers State Governor, Siminalayi Fubara, expressed optimism that Boko Haram insurgents and other terrorist groups will be defeated . Rivers State governor expressed optimism in the hope of defeating terrorists .

Title: The great star on the way
Summary: The great Star had been here on earth before to proclaim the birth of the Lord, Jesus . It stood high in the sky directly in the air directly in Jesus' birthplace .

Title: Armed Forces Remembrance Day: Tinubu, Shettima, govs, others pay tributes to fallen heroes
Summary: Tinubu, Shettima, govs, others pay tributes to fallen heroes . Peter Obi said Nigeria can only truly honour its fallen soldiers by providing leadership that delivers peace and hope .

Title: End self-marginalisation, Soludo urges Igbo people
Summary: Governor Chukwuma Soludo of Anambra State has called on youths in the South-East to end what he described as self-marginalisation by enlisting in the Nigerian Armed Forces . Soludo urges Igbo people to embrace their roles as ‘co-owners’ of the Nigerian project .

Title: Inflation drops to 15.15%, as food inflation declines further
Summary: Inflation rate fell by 2.18 percentage points to 15.15 percent in December 2025 from 17.33 percent in November 2025 . The NBS disclosed this in its Consumer Price Index (CPI), report for December 2025 . Recall, early this week that the NBS adjusted its CPI methodology .

Title: 2026: FG to move away from macroeconomic figures to citizens welfare —Edun
Summary: There are indications that the Federal Government is set for a major shift in its economic policy direction in 2026 . The Federal Government will focus more on delivering tangible improvement in livelihood of citizens than in achieving positive macroeconomic figures . This formed the key content of the speech delivered by the Minister of Finance and…Edun .

Title: Silent signals: How poor broadband leaves many Nigerians digitally disconnected
Summary: "At first, I tried to stay calm, telling myself maybe his battery was dead or he was just settling in. But every hour that passed..." The post: How poor broadband leaves many Nigerians digitally disconnected .
